text: Bhagyarekha (Telugu: భాగ్యరేఖ) is an Indian Telugu language soap opera directed by V. Sasibhushan premiered on 24 June 2019 airing on Gemini TV every Monday to Saturday at 8:30PM IST. The serial stars Ishwarya Vullingala and Maneesh as main protagonists and Nalini, Ragha Madhuri, Bharani Shankar, Sri Rithika, and Kalyan in supporting roles. The show is the remake of the Tamil television series Nayaki which is being aired on Sun TV. ==Plot== The series revolves around the three strong women. Siri (Ishwarya Vullingala) was a sweet natured, yet bold girl was raised in poverty unaware of being a rich heir due to certain circumstances. Sunanda (Ragha Madhuri), the lady of an empire but a bird in a gilded cage, yearns to avenge her husband Devendra varma's misdeeds. Chittemma (Nalini) is arrogant but kind lady who has risen amidst all put downs but failed to bond with her loved ones. The story is about how fate entwines their lives. Siri works in retail stores and co-worker Meena (Sri Rithika) became a best friend. Devendra (Bharani Shankar) is the business man who has eyes upon wealth of the girl, came to know about that the legal heir is still alive while his attempts to clinch her wealth. On the other hand, Devendra's son Rishi (Maneesh) met Siri and he loves Siri. Will Siri realize her roots and how she will safeguard and own her wealth is main plot of the story. ==Cast== ===Main cast=== *Sharanya Janjam as Deepthi *Divya Ganesh (1-143)/Yashaswini K Swamy (144-246)/Ishwarya Vullingala (247-present) as Sirisha aka Siri, Legal heir of property under Devendra *Maneesh as Maharshi aka Rishi *Hrithi (1-234)/Shivani(235-present) as Neha (central minister Kishan's daughter) *Bharani Shankar as Devendra Varma (Rishi and Deepthi's Father) *Nalini as Chittemma (Vasu, Varun and Kaveri's mother) *Raghamadhuri (1-246) /Vasundhara(247-present) as Sunanda(Rishi and Deepthi's mother) *Posani Krishnamurali as Nanda Kumar ===Supporting cast=== *Sri Rithika as Meena (Siri's best friend and Vasu's wife) *Raghava P Venkat (1-224)/Chakri (225-present) as Raghava (Devendra's personal Assistant) *Kalyan as Vasu *Kalpana Reddy(1-205)/Sharanya (206 - present) as Deepthi, Rishi's sister *Devaraj Reddy aa Siddharth, Raghava's son *Kaveri as Vasanthi, Vasu's younger sister *Kushal Naidu as Varun, Vasu's younger brother *Master Venkat showrya as Surya(Nani), Siri's brother *Balaji as Narayana Murthy(Siri's foster father) *Ravuri Ramesh as Kishan (Central Minister and Devendra's friend) *Kota Shankar rao as Yadagiri, Meena's father *Naveena as Sujatha, Meena's mother *Abhiram as Viswaroop *Shirisha as Siddharth's mother *Seethamaalakshmi as Sravani *Niranjan as Veerraju (deceased) *Ajay as Bhupathi, Siri's biological father-deceased (cameo appearance) *Sravanthi as Revathi, Siri's biological mother (Cameo appearance) ==Linguistic Versions== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !style="width:100pt;
